# streetsidesoftware.code-spell-checker Cache

Caches the `streetsidesoftware.code-spell-checker` VSIX for offline spell checking support.

- **Cache path**: `/opt/extensions/streetsidesoftware.code-spell-checker`
- **Named volume**: `aspire_streetsidesoftware_code_spell_checker_extension_cache`
- **Service**: `streetsidesoftware-code-spell-checker-extension`
